item.title: 👎Chandler Felt - WA State Association of Boundary Review Boards
item.description: Chandler Felt signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent WA State Association of Boundary Review Boards.

item.title: 👍💵Andrea Smiley - Building Industry Association of Washington
item.description: Andrea Smiley signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Building Industry Association of Washington. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍James Fletcher - City of Cashmere
item.description: James Fletcher signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent City of Cashmere.

item.title: 👎💵Bryce Yadon - Futurewise
item.description: Bryce Yadon signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Futurewise. They are a registered lobbyist.
